description: From peace +â€Ž keeping, after keep the peace.

entries.meaning: The act of preserving peace, specifically between hostile groups or states, especially by a sanctioned military force. [from 17th c.]
examples: Peacekeeping is one of the things that the United Nations, for all its foibles, does well.

entries.meaning: (as a noun modifier) (for example) a peacekeeping force.
